YOU BELONG HERE
Lavish Seattle living is realized at Arrivé, where exceptional service and access to hotel concierge amenities combine to create a personalized apartment living experience.
Arrivé is conveniently located near world-class employers and within walking distance to award-winning restaurants, nightlife, and iconic attractions.
41 FLOORS OF BREATHTAKING VIEWS
Our 30 floors of superior apartments sit conveniently above The Sound Hotel at Belltown, surrounded by the Seattle cityscape, Elliot Bay and Lake Union.
Our premier penthouses feature elevated in-unit finishes and unparalleled views.
• Air conditioning in every residence
• Front-load washer and dryer
• Quartz countertops with coordinating tile backsplash
• Deep soaking tubs in bathrooms
• Wood cabinetry and plank flooring in your choice of designer palettes
• Smart lock system for enabling keyless entry
• Integrated window treatments on all windows
• Thoughtfully integrated USB charging ports
• Select residences include private terraces, walk-in closets, under-cabinet lighting, and French-door refrigerators with PureAir filtration system
• Penthouses feature exclusive color palettes and include waterfall islands and Miele appliances.
Lighting, thermostats, and window treatments are controlled from your smartphone with instant connectivity to Z-Wave technology
ELEVATED AMENITIES, IN MORE WAYS THAN ONE
Arrivé has a variety of floorplan types for all residents, with large windows showcasing Seattle’s natural beauty.
Take advantage of community spaces to host private gatherings or enjoy a glass of wine with friends on the spacious rooftop lounge with an indoor/outdoor kitchen and bar.
• Outdoor roof terrace with comfortable seating, fire pit, and grill stations
• State-of-the-art theater lounge with 10-foot projection screen, surround sound, and its own kitchen/bar
• Skyline view lounge with fireplace, games, full kitchen, and dining area
• Fitness center with interactive workout programming and yoga terrace
• Conference and meeting rooms
• Pet play area with grooming lounge
• Casual dining and cocktails at Currant Bistro, just off the lobby
• Espresso bar with grab-and-go food options for busy mornings
• Free Wi-Fi in the lobby and all amenity spaces
• Controlled access, underground parking
